reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: VOLUNTARY CONTRIBUTION 2021- UNFPA/UNICEF “ELIMINATION OF FEMALE GENITAL MUTILATION: ACCELERATING CHANGE” (FASE III)

description.narrative: Il contributo supporta il Programma congiunto UNFPA/UNICEF multi-donatori “Elimination of Female Genital Mutilation/Cutting: Accelerating Change” (Fase III), per l'eradicazione delle mutilazioni genitili femminili.

The contributions aim to support the Program UNFPA/UNICEF multi-donatori “Elimination of Female Genital Mutilation/Cutting: Accelerating Change” (Phase III),to eradicate the female genital mutilation/cutting.

sector.narrative: ENDING VIOLENCE AGAINST WOMEN AND GIRLS

tag.narrative: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
